name: jonesycode-dev
description: Interactive HTML, CSS, TypeScript, Angular and Python learning walkthroughs - Jonesys Code Dev

scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:typescript && npm run build:angular && npm run build:python
scripts.dev: npm run build && npx http-server . -p 8080 -o html/index.html
scripts.watch: concurrently "cd html && tsc --watch" "cd css && tsc --watch" "cd typescript && tsc --watch" "cd angular && tsc --watch" "cd python && tsc --watch" "npm run serve"

author: Jonesys Code Dev
